- selenium is a framework that allows us to interact with HTML elements from any website
- you have to install seleniunm via pip and something called chrome driver
- pip stands for package install python
- pip comes with python
- you need to download chrome web driver
https://sites.google.com/chromium.org/driver/?pli=1
- your chrome web driver and google chrome version need to be the same
- in finder you can go to view in top bar and then hit show path to get the path
- yt video series you used
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b5jt2bhSeXs

commands
- to access elements in html, click on any element, right click and hit inspect element
pip install selenium
